properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 4 at 2:22PM PST until January 6 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...HEAVY SNOW THROUGH MONDAY IN THE CASCADE MOUNTAINS...

.Several rounds of moderate to heavy snow will impact the Cascade
Crest this weekend and into next week. Additional accumulations
of 6 to 12 inches are expected at Stevens Pass Sunday morning
through Sunday night with additional heavy snow thereafter. If
you have plans to travel over the Cascade Passes the next several
days, monitor road reports closely.

* WHAT...Snowfall of 6-12 inches expected.

* WHERE...For The Cascade Crest including Highway 2
between Coles Corner and Stevens Pass.

* WHEN...From 10 AM Sunday to 4 AM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Treacherous driving conditions on Highway 2 from Coles
Corner to Stevens Pass. Mountain recreation will be locally
dangerous in the Cascades.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A series of weather systems will bring
periods of moderate to heavy snow to the Cascades this weekend
into next week. If you have plans to travel over the Cascade
Passes the next several days, monitor road reports closely.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM SUNDAY TO 4 AM PST MONDAY
